About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I was always passionate about Linux - I've been using it since Ubuntu 6.04. I have a Systems Administration Technician certification from a local school, and some experience from my personal projects(check out My Work subpage). I'm constantly learning and sharpening my skills. In 2019, I want to realize my dream of working in the industry. I can be a valuable addition to your team thanks to strong problem solving skills and my can-do attitude. Google and Server Fault are my friends - I'm not lost no matter what tech I'm working with.
